headline: As Tech Stocks Stumble Industrials Are A Buy in 2026 (And 3 Stocks Leading the Way)
summary: Industrial stocks delivered steady growth in 2025 while tech volatility rattled portfolios. Specialty chemicals and industrial gas companies expanded margins and generated resilient cash flows. The Nasdaq-100 has declined 2.3% year-to-date through February 17, creating a contrasting backdrop for industrial sector performance.
